su.cs08.classifier.server.querying
Class QueryingClient

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Thread
      su.cs08.classifier.server.querying.QueryingClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, IClientListener, IClientSender
public class QueryingClient
extends Thread
implements IClientListener, IClientSender

This is the querying thread client handler. When the client identifies itself as a querying client a client session thread is started and it is ready to handle requests.

A querying request specifies comma separated values for the attributes and should return all possible class values with the probability of matching the given instance to the appropriate class.

Author:
plamKaTa
